verbose_text: In light of the aforementioned medical properties of MH, in the present study, we thus aimed to investigate the hypothesis that MH may protect the liver against injury due to AA induced toxicity by modulating the expression of inducible nitric oxide synthase (iNOS), endothelial nitric oxide synthase (eNOS), CytP450, PARP-1, antioxidant enzymes and other pathological parameters related to hepatotoxicity in a male murine model.
